at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication

Class DaemonEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication.DaemonEndpoint

  • public class DaemonEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the connection endpoint at the buffer daemon to a JVM containing GBots with its DataPoint instances. Incoming requests are routed to the daemon implementation over the ClientRequestExecutionStrategy-interface. This allows a loose coupling between the daemon implementation and the protocol implementation

        java.io.IOException - if this operation fails

      • disconnectImmediately

        public void disconnectImmediately()
        Closes the connection to the daemon without sending a disconnect message. Is the connection is not established, any call to this method is ignored.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Closes the connection to the daemon. Is the connection is not established, any call to this method is ignored.
